data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":null,"id":85937,"title":"Clubbing","original_title":"De caravana","overview":"Juan Cruz, un fotógrafo de clase alta de Córdoba, tiene que sacar fotos en el recital del cantante popular “La Mona” Jiménez. En este ámbito de costumbres desconocidas para él, descubrirá otro mundo, el de Sara, una joven atractiva con quien vivirá una historia de amor y una peligrosa caravana de aventuras.","poster_path":"/4lu9oJgRLbyR6IUsRfSvsfSh7VK.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"es","genre_ids":[35,18],"popularity":2.246,"release_date":"2011-11-03","video":false,"vote_average":5.917,"vote_count":6},{"backdrop_path":"/wDuqneZlZNkXDQcQUu80wA1Hden.jpg","id":1047223,"title":"The Vourdalak","original_title":"Le Vourdalak","overview":"Lost in a hostile forest, the Marquis d'Urfé, a noble emissary of the King of France, finds refuge in the home of a strange family.","poster_path":"/ob7IFMEQcEOWSy2IQbV6arFCd0y.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[14,27,18],"popularity":11.859,"release_date":"2023-10-25","video":false,"vote_average":5.6,"vote_count":16},{"backdrop_path":"/2i0UBKObcarBSmSAa1yXVW52bgn.jpg","id":1146148,"title":"Sorry, Charlie","original_title":"Sorry, Charlie","overview":"A remote helpline volunteer is targeted by a stranger who lures women from their homes with a recording of a crying baby.","poster_path":"/5FdlhzK976qK6tbmVre5eX1CGAt.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[27,53],"popularity":33.663,"release_date":"2023-10-06","video":false,"vote_average":7.167,"vote_count":9},{"backdrop_path":"/pI5sXywoMYz9V0Ml2Sk2skzhW0A.jpg","id":667241,"title":"A Bruddah's Mind","original_title":"Cabeça de Nêgo","overview":"Leader of the student union, Saulo is the target of racist curses inside the classroom. When he retaliates, he is called to the principal's office, but refuses to suffer the consequences of the attack alone, since the aggressor is not responsible for his speech. Inspired by readings about the Black Panthers, the boy decides to stay in school until justice is done. Meanwhile, he exposes the neglect of the establishment's structure with his cell phone. Gradually, colleagues, teachers, directors and even politicians get involved in the conflict that is highlighted in the media.","poster_path":"/vbU8viY4tzm0oO7EJWLaArWHIXz.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"pt","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":3.325,"release_date":"2021-10-21","video":false,"vote_average":7.375,"vote_count":8},{"backdrop_path":"/iiF3nvxwPGMwT49ZwHNk62Ixf5T.jpg","id":616329,"title":"Wild Boar","original_title":"Wild Boar","overview":"A small group of treasure seekers, also known as \"Geocachers,\" who trek into to the desert to conquer a Geocache Challenge. Out in the wild they stumble upon a forbidden world flooded with radiation and inhabited by a race of bloodthirsty mutants who have evolved from pigs.","poster_path":"/fQJibuMsRXBvC1zBA1rEmT0BHlX.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[27,878],"popularity":4.795,"release_date":"2019-11-02","video":false,"vote_average":5.0,"vote_count":2},{"backdrop_path":null,"id":622225,"title":"Queen Lear","original_title":"Kraliçe Lear","overview":"Shakespeare's 'King Lear' travelling on the dusty and risky roads to the remotest forgotten villages in the mountains of Turkey where even drinking water can hardly reach, turns delicately into 'Queen Lear' in the hands of a peasant-women theatre group. In the early 2000s, a handful of peasant women from the mountains of southern Turkey formed a theater group, which later became the subject of the documentary, The Play. The women acted out their own life stories in the village, and the play changed their lives. Now, they take to the road with an adaptation of Shakespeare's King Lear, traveling the dusty, dangerous roads to the farthest-flung mountain villages where there isn't even running water. On the road, their lives merge with the world of King Lear and become bound up with \"the good and the bad\", \"the young and the old\", \"the rich and the poor\", \"the honest and the dishonest\" of the play.","poster_path":"/78rUo6OFbfTgHcoO12oAbpfZYW4.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"tr","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":3.916,"release_date":"2019-08-16","video":false,"vote_average":6.333,"vote_count":5},{"backdrop_path":"/8Q2RVcAPsLF0vkRnze7mYDySgY9.jpg","id":1214905,"title":"Trinil","original_title":"Trinil: Kembalikan Tubuhku","overview":"Returning home after their honeymoon, a couple find themselves haunted by a disembodied head seeking its missing body.","poster_path":"/yJ7uXTYiFS21wYxluX3gAzfLDiU.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"id","genre_ids":[18,27,53],"popularity":23.391,"release_date":"2024-01-04","video":false,"vote_average":5.2,"vote_count":4},{"backdrop_path":"/rpsPRtW8QIYqEIvLfxgVOhr7shM.jpg","id":617212,"title":"Hamka \u0026 Siti Raham Vol. 2","original_title":"Hamka \u0026 Siti Raham Vol. 2","overview":"This biopic explores Muslim scholar Buya Hamka's life and hardships alongside his loving wife, Siti Raham, after Indonesia gained independence.","poster_path":"/r3bEU1Ge4whELCDi1JsniqSJriZ.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"id","genre_ids":[18,36],"popularity":11.253,"release_date":"2023-12-21","video":true,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":2},{"backdrop_path":"/ePTcmVtDY9GxGRqiGotduti8rs3.jpg","id":978027,"title":"Bitten","original_title":"La Morsure","overview":"1967, Mardi Gras.
